net.sourceforge.pmd.lang.java.oom

Class PackageStats

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.sourceforge.pmd.lang.java.oom.PackageStats

  • public final class PackageStats
extends Object
    Package statistics. This recursive data structure mirrors the package structure of the analysed project and stores information about the classes and subpackages it contains.
    Author:
    Cl√©ment Fournier
    See Also:
    ClassStats

      Returns true if the signature of the operation designated by the qualified name is covered by the mask.

      Returns true if the signature of the field designated by its name and the qualified name of its class is covered by the mask.

      • hasMatchingSig

        public boolean hasMatchingSig(QualifiedName qname,
                              OperationSigMask sigMask)
        Returns true if the signature of the operation designated by the qualified name is covered by the mask.
        Parameters:
        qname - The operation to test
        sigMask - The signature mask to use
        Returns:
        True if the signature of the operation designated by the qualified name is covered by the mask.

      • hasMatchingSig

        public boolean hasMatchingSig(QualifiedName qname,
                              String fieldName,
                              FieldSigMask sigMask)
        Returns true if the signature of the field designated by its name and the qualified name of its class is covered by the mask.
        Parameters:
        qname - The class of the field
        fieldName - The name of the field
        sigMask - The signature mask to use
        Returns:
        True if the signature of the field is covered by the mask.
